PROCESS BEFORE OUTPUT.																																
 MODULE status_0100.																																
 MODULE init_condition. " 조회 기간 초기값 설정.																																
   MODULE refresh_tc.																																
   LOOP AT gt_tab INTO gs_tab WITH CONTROL my_table_in.																																
     MODULE set_table_in.																																
   ENDLOOP.																																
   LOOP AT gt_tab2 INTO gs_tab2 WITH CONTROL my_table_out.																																
     MODULE set_table_out.																																
   ENDLOOP.																																
 MODULE clear_ok_code.																																
																																
PROCESS AFTER INPUT.																																
 MODULE exit AT EXIT-COMMAND.																																
   LOOP AT gt_tab.																																
     FIELD zsc702_in-cmark MODULE cmark_change_in ON REQUEST.																																
   ENDLOOP.																																
   LOOP AT gt_tab2.																																
     FIELD zsc702_out-cmark MODULE cmark_change_out ON REQUEST.																																
   ENDLOOP.																																
 MODULE user_command_0100.
